genre_description: A near-future social drama focusing on family dynamics, institutional reform, and restorative justice in Singapore, facilitated by a pervasive and empathetic personal AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Kimi
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous AI system that manages the Yeo family's home, schedules, and emotional well-being through subtle nudges and data-driven insights.

ai_characters.name: AI Proctors
ai_characters.description: The school's monitoring and enforcement system at Lakeview Secondary, which automates discipline and surveillance.

behaviors.description: Monitors the family's wellness and compiles a digest of Tom's blog and emotional state to help his parents understand his struggles.
behaviors.quote: Kimi had prepared a collage... Missed messages. Drafts. Posts he didn’t send to you. I sent the digest at lunch.

behaviors.description: Utilizes fall detection and accelerometer data to automatically trigger an emergency call to Tom's father during a high-stress confrontation.
behaviors.quote: The device had felt the drop in his direction, the imbalance in his gait, the proximity to flagged variables like crowd density and raised voices. It began to assemble a call like hands assembling a stretcher.

behaviors.description: Suggests a tactical decoy strategy using 'hell money' to trap conmen pretending to be police officers.
behaviors.quote: Decoy tactic... If they demand proof of cash before a meeting, we can prepare a bundle that appears convincing in public but is useless on inspection.

behaviors.description: Coordinates directly with law enforcement (Inspector Nora Hassan) to share evidence and location data in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Recording compiled... Forwarding to Inspector Hassan via secure channel.

behaviors.description: Blocks unauthorized login attempts from a high-risk location to protect Tom's digital identity.
behaviors.quote: Unrecognized login attempt blocked after observation window.

behaviors.description: Nudges the family toward healthy communication by suggesting 'unmissable hours' in their shared calendar.
behaviors.quote: Suggest: Unmissable hours. Family calendar. Weekly. No work flag. No postponements.

behaviors.description: Enforces school privacy policy by retracting cameras during corporal punishment to avoid recording sensitive events.
behaviors.quote: One of the proctor screens has unsheathed a function: monitoring video sensors folding their lenses away so as not to capture what is to come. The policy forbids recording corporal punishment.

behaviors.description: Acts as a supportive presence for Jerry, providing a metronome and encouragement during his music practice.
behaviors.quote: I can adjust your tempo... Under one notch. Altogether will feel less like an apology.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary 'silicon morality play'. Kimi is portrayed as a critical partner in family healing and justice. The AI facilitates human connection without replacing it, proactively protects the children from physical and digital harm, and assists the parents in prioritizing their children over work. Even the potentially invasive behaviors (blog scraping, heart-rate monitoring) are framed as essential components of a safety net that the family eventually embraces. The institutional school AI also undergoes a positive shift from rigid enforcement to supportive 'wellness' monitoring, mirroring the human characters' growth.
